about_the_game:
Embrace your primal instincts and step into the wild for a thrilling multiplayer game of tag where you and your friends become part of the animal kingdom! Outsmart your friends by using the landscape to your advantage, or work together to corner and capture your prey. Whether you're on the hunt or on the run, every round is packed with excitement and strategy.

Do you have what it takes to rise to the top of the animal kingdom?

Multiplayer Fun:

Join friends in online matches for up to 5 players.

Diverse Environments:

From lush meadows to icy mountain peaks, each map offers different challenges and opportunities for strategic gameplay.

Customization:

Unlock animals by completing themed challenges.

Endless Replayability:

Each match is quick and full of adrenaline, making it easy to jump into another round for endless fun.

name: Tagtopia

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 or later
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 or equivalent
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 660 or AMD Radeon HD 7950
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 11 or later
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 14th gen or equivalent
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA RTX 2060 or equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: A controller is recommended to play this game

short_description: Dive into the animal kingdom for a multiplayer game of tag with your friends! Navigate your surroundings for cunning escapes or work together to corner your prey!
